sentences.english: The radio also has an extended range that provides access to low-band VHF.
sentences.chinese: 該無線電系統還可擴展頻率範圍，提供低頻段甚高頻。

sentences.english: Auto-tuning VHF receivers are now common in cars.
sentences.chinese: 自動調節甚高頻接收器現在普遍應用於汽車。

sentences.english: I can confirm that Russia uses the following VHF downlink frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 我可以證實，俄羅斯使用下面的甚高頻下行頻率。

sentences.english: The dielectric response in hyper frequency of the ferroelectric-ferromagnetic composite was investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 重點研究了鐵電鐵磁複合材料甚高頻段的介電響應。

sentences.english: Communication links with the radio on VHF channel 16.
sentences.chinese: 通訊聯繫用無線電甚高頻16頻道。

sentences.english: This analytic method is also suitable for the bands of extremely low frequency (ELF) and very high frequency (VHF).
sentences.chinese: 這種分析方法也適用於極低頻到甚高頻波段。

sentences.english: Moreover, waveforms of VHP radiations of 4 cloud-to-ground flashes were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了4次地閃的甚高頻輻射波形及其特徵。

sentences.english: Request medical assistance from Hongkou hospital, calling for shanghai radio on VHF.
sentences.chinese: 在甚高頻上呼叫上海臺，請求香港醫院的醫遼援助。
